description: A clean, professional CV template with a traditional layout.

sections.label: Professional Summary
sections.prompt_context: Write a professional summary paragraph for the CV header area. Should be 2-3 sentences highlighting key qualifications and career objectives.

sections.label: Work Highlights
sections.prompt_context: Write achievement-oriented bullet points highlighting key accomplishments from work experience. Use action verbs and quantify results where possible.

sections.label: Project Descriptions
sections.prompt_context: Write concise project descriptions suitable for a CV. Focus on technologies used, your role, and outcomes.

sections.label: Skills Summary
sections.prompt_context: Write a concise skills summary combining technical and soft skills relevant to the target role. Can be a short paragraph or comma-separated list.
